candidates.name: Ash Nayyar
candidates.why_elect: I am an educated {(Master of Business Administration in Finance (McGill-Canada)} and experienced commercial banker (16 years with three major banks in NZ). I have helped turn around many losing businesses into profitable ones.I am not a Career Politician and will always stand for Integrity/Fairness.
candidates.why_stand: I chose to live in Dargaville three years ago and have since enjoyed every minute of my work/family life. I strongly believe this town has the potential to be bustling again and I have the financial qualifications, business skills and experience to make it happen.

candidates.name: Marni Stewart
candidates.why_elect: I don't have a PHD, I don't know all the policies, but what I lack I have the drive, the passion to make things right. I listen and want to make changes for the better for everyone. I will do the hard yards and also get my hands dirty.
candidates.why_stand: Dargaville is my home town, and I am proud to come from here, just with what has been happening I am worried for my children to so I am running to help make things better for my kids and my community.

candidates.before_politics: Practice Manager of a Law Firm
candidates.name: Eryn Wilson-Collins
candidates.why_elect: I've lived in Dargaville all my life and I have been involved with community groups since I was a teenager. I currently serve on the board of the Dargaville Community Cinema Charitable Trust and I am President of the Dargaville Little Theatre. I have a business management background.
candidates.why_stand: I am running for Council because I love the area I live in. I was born and grew up here and I want to represent my community during a time of real change in the world.
